Html: I am trying to create a super seeding update and i am missing the menu Create Superseding Updae when i click on existing update of Adobe flash player or Java. I am new to Wsus Package manager so need help.

Pls have a look on page 5: http://www.codeplex.com/Download?ProjectName=WsusPackagePublisher&DownloadId=679803

You can select a Supersedes Update. Is this what you are searching for?

I have noticed that there was an option of "Create Superseding Update" in the context menu of an update in WSUS package publisher. That option is missing. I feel like that there are any pre-reqs for creating a superseding update with MSI package of flash player. may be i am missing that pre-req you know about it.

If the option is gray out, please verify these points :
  • Wsus Console version must match the Wsus Server Version
  • Wpp don't run against a Replica server.
